message:
The full quote is  “The most valuable resource that all teachers have is each other.  Without collaboration our growth is limited to our own perspectives.”  – Robert John Meehan
This holds true for those who work in the anti-human trafficking field. We all bring a different perspectives and viewpoints to the table.  
When we don’t collaborate we are doing a disservice to the people we are serving. Luckily we work with many like minded people across the country who are dedicated to making a difference. 
#collaboration #Communication #listening #commongoal #makingadifference #together
